get.description: Lists information about all Block Storage API versions.
Shows details for Block Storage API v2.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

get.description: Lists summary information for all Block Storage volumes that the tenant who submits the request can access.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

get.description: Lists detailed information for all Block Storage volumes that the tenant who submits the request can access.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: volume_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an existing volume.

get.description: Shows information about a specified volume.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the volume.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the volume.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: volume_type_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an existing volume type.

put.summary: Update extra specs for a volume type
put.description: Updates the extra specifications assigned to a volume type.

get.description: Shows information about a specified volume type.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

post.description: Creates a snapshot, which is a point-in-time complete copy of a volume. You can create a volume from the snapshot.

parameters.name: snapshot
parameters.description: A partial representation of a snapshot used in the creation process.

parameters.name: volume_id
parameters.description: To create a snapshot from an existing volume, specify the ID of the existing volume.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: [True/False] Indicate whether to snapshot, even if the volume is attached. Default==False.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the snapshot. Default==None.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of snapshot. Default==None.

get.description: Lists summary information for all Block Storage snapshots that the tenant who submits the request can access.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

get.description: Lists detailed information for all Block Storage snapshots that the tenant who submits the request can access.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: snapshot_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an existing snapshot.

get.description: Shows information for a specified snapshot.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Describes the snapshot.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the snapshot.

parameters.name: tenant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the tenant or account.

parameters.name: snapshot_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an existing snapshot.

get.description: Shows the metadata for a specified snapshot.

put.description: Updates the metadata for a specified snapshot.
